page.title: 16Biography of "Local Squire"
page.content: Mrs.Sylvia Grant-Dalton is the owner of{Brodsworth Hall}and the estate around it,and a remarkable lady at that.Not only is she descended from the Scottish king{Robert the Bruce}and is a former landowner on the island of Mull,but she is also descended from Peter{Thellusson},a French banker and aristocrat who fled to England in the French Revolution.She was born in 1899,the daughter of Reginald West,and inheirited the Hall in 1930 or 1931. She has been married twice,first to Capt.C.Grant-Dalton,and after his death,to his first-cousin,Maj.E.Grant- Dalton.She came into the Hall when she married her first husband,as the Hall has been in the Thellusson family for years.She became a widow in 1970 when Eustace died.Since,she has lived at the Hall simply in the company of her two dogs,housekeeper,and chef.
